methods.name: parseDataType
methods.comment: Parse the specified dtName within the specified category.

params.name: size
params.comment: optional data-type size, or -1 for unspecified

return.comment: data-type if found, or null if not found

methods.name: adjustPointerDataTypes
methods.comment:
Adjust pointer data-types based upon specified size which may not be 
 factored into pointer specification (e.g., void *32).
